src_original: anityatvasya kāryatvaṃ na sādhakamityarthaḥ/  avidyamānasya sādhyasya hetuḥ kathaṃ
iti bhāvaḥ/ kasya sādhyamanityatvamiti/  anityatvaṃ kāryatvasya sādhyaṃ  na bhavatītyarthaḥ/

kālatrayaśabdena kāryakālatatpūrvakālatatpaścātkālāḥ  vivakṣitāḥ/  “heturahetunā na viśiṣṭayate/ ahetunā  sādharmyāt pratyavasthānam ahetusamaḥ“iti bhāṣyam/  prakāśikā  arthāpattisamālakṣaṇam  arthāpattipuraskāreṇa sādhyābhāvodbhāvanam arthāpattisamā/
